Title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
Writer: Barry Fanaro (screenplay), Alexander Payne (screenplay), Jim Taylor (screenplay), Lew Gallo (treatment)
Actors: Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Jessica Biel, Dan Aykroyd
Plot: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.
Production: Universal Pictures, Happy Madison Productions, Shady Acres Entertainment
